title: Rack In My Sleep (
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Rack in My Sleep par NAV
[NAV]
1K
Yeah, yeah

[NAV]
Bust down anklet on your feet
So I don't feel guilty when I cheat (Cheat)
Envelope with receipts (Yeah)
We shop in LV
I got snakeskin on my feet
Slimy snakes with me (Slatt)
I got millions in my reach

[NAV]
Lots of checks, gettin' plaques every time that I release

Talkin' money, no speech impediment when I speak
Bank account, every time I log in I'm relieved
Large amounts, gettin' deposits on repeat
Your baby mama gave me top, she got that evidence on her knees
Say she not a freak, in a couple of weeks, brought her up to speed
Molly made 'em crack, I spent eight grand to fix my teeth
On Rodeo Drive, my dentist right next to LV
Every time I get dressed, my outfit is undersea
Talkin' racks on an off day, my outfit costs three
Lay everything out, I forget about jackets, I can't see
You counted me out, when you coulda counted these racks with me
Yeah


[NAV]
Bust down anklet on your feet
So I don't feel guilty when I cheat (Cheat)
Envelope with receipts (Yeah)
We shop in LV
I got snakeskin on my feet
Slimy snakes with me (Slatt)
I got millions in my reach

[Derek Wise]
Big ol' racks, I started with hundreds, I used to dream (Dream)
No more ice, got a bad habit, I just bought three (Ice)
Poltergeist, we in a Ghost, we can't be seen (Skrrt, skrrt)
Jumpin' out babe, she say she good, but she a demon

I just fell in love, I brought my baby to the Neimans
If it's good, treat her like laundry and I leave it (Yeah)
Can't go back, that's one of my vices I'm repeatin' (Yeah)
She not yours, her heart Hallmark if anyone's greeting (Yeah)

[88Camino]
Jimmy Neutron, she give me brain, she goin' insane
Black and blue hunnids, I knew a Smurf and she was a babe (Yeah)
Got the drips yeah, I can surf on any wave
How many tips yeah, boy, you saved as much as I made
Feelin' froggy, boy, then leap

Every homie and I got trees
Fuckin' a bad ho every week (Yeah)
I be off Perkys when I tweak
Navy Seals, sleep with a steel
When she can't feel, I'm makin' it real
How many times I play with scopes
X-ray vision but not my goals

[NAV]
Bust down anklet on your feet
So I don't feel guilty when I cheat (Cheat)
Envelope with receipts (Yeah)
We shop in LV
I got snakeskin on my feet
Slimy snakes with me (Slatt)
I got millions in my reach

Lots of checks, get plaques every time that I release
